title: HOUR 3- CC Sabathia Oct 13, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- CC Sabathia Oct 13, 2020
description:
CC Sabathia tells Dan that it is hard for him to get a pitch over the plate now from on top of the pitching mound now. CC says he tried to throw a pitch for his sons batting practice and he barely got the ball across the plate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
